item.title: About
item.description: A passionate full stack web developer and DIY enthusiast from Hermosillo, Sonora. Feel free to check my projects on github: Pi garden - an automated garden using raspberry pi and sensors. A custom new tab for my browsers - forked from another project, yo can see it here. This blog - Using Hugo, a static site generator built using Go, with a custom theme. shoot me an email: chris.
